So far, you have learnt to ask a RQ, design a study, and describe and summarise the data.
**In this chapter**, you will learn how decisions are made in science, so you can answer RQs.
You will learn to:

* state the two broad reasons to explain the difference between statistics and parameters.
* explain how decisions are made in research.
